trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> class is the base class for request response classes, like the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse" /> and <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddResponse" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> è la classe base per le classi di risposta alle richieste, quali <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse" /> e <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.Controls" /> property contains an array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl" /> objects returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.Controls" /> contiene una matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl" /> restituiti dal server.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl" /> objects returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl" /> restituiti dal server.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.ErrorMessage" /> property contains the error message, if any, for this operation.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.ErrorMessage" /> contiene l'eventuale messaggio di errore per l'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The error message, if any, for this operation.
trans-unit.target: Eventuale messaggio di errore per l'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.MatchedDN" /> property contains the matched distinguished name returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.MatchedDN" /> contiene il nome distinto corrispondente restituito dal server.

trans-unit.source: The matched distinguished name returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: Nome distinto corrispondente restituito dal server.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.Referral" /> property contains the server referrals.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.Referral" /> contiene i riferimenti del server.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.RequestId" /> property contains the Request Identifier.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.RequestId" /> contiene l'identificatore della richiesta.

trans-unit.source: User attempted to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: L'utente ha tentato di impostare il valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.ResultCode" /> property contains the result code of the operation.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse.ResultCode" /> contiene il codice di risultato dell'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The result code of the operation.
